ch.aplu.android

Interface GGOrientationSensorListener


  • public interface GGOrientationSensorListener
    Declarations of the notification method called when the orientation sensor reports new values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sensorChanged(int[] values)
      Event callback method called when the orientation sensor is initialized and reports new values for azimuth, pitch or roll.

    • Method Detail

      • sensorChanged

        void sensorChanged(int[] values)
        Event callback method called when the orientation sensor is initialized and reports new values for azimuth, pitch or roll.
        Parameters:
        values - int array with the measured values:
        values[0] : azimuth in a device coordinate system (independent of current device orientation) values[1] : pitch in a device coordinate system (independent of current device orientation) values[2] : roll in a device coordinate system (independent of current device orientation) values[3] : azimuth adapted to current device orientation (compass line bottom to top) values[4] : pitch adapted to current device orientation (tilt forward angle) values[5] : roll adapted to current device orientation (tile left angle)
